definition: A genre of motion pictures that primarily aims to evoke intense feelings of fear, terror, and shock in the audience. These films often feature elements of suspense, supernatural occurrences, violence, and psychological distress. They are typically enjoyed by fans of thrilling and frightening entertainment, seeking an adrenaline rush or a chilling experience.
